sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.WorkflowIconsSCR</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Service Catalog Request Workflow Icons</description>
        <name>WorkflowIconsSCR</name>
        <script><![CDATA[/**
 * This is only used to handle Request Items with a Delivery Plan or a Workflow.
 */
gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var WorkflowIconsSCR = Class.create();
WorkflowIconsSCR.prototype = Object.extendsObject(WorkflowIconsStages, { 
   
   initialize: function(ref) {
      this.elementName = ref;
      this.element = GlideEvaluator.evaluateString(ref);
      this.gr = this.element.getGlideRecord();
   },
   
   process: function(cl) {
   
   	  function isError(cl) {
		  if (cl.getSize() == 1)
			  if (cl.getChoice(0).value == 'error')
				  return true;
		  return false;
	  }
	  
	  if (isError(cl))
		  return cl;

      return WorkflowIconsStages.prototype.process.call(this, cl);
	   
   },
 
   type: "WorkflowIconsSCR"
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2008-04-18 02:04:42</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5f46c2470a0a0b8c000d7005ed96239f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>110</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>WorkflowIconsSCR</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Catalog Platform" source="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.platform">6d218d0f6d2620100acb70b35343303c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5f46c2470a0a0b8c000d7005ed96239f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-04-30 20:05:43</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>736</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
